value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Do you see it? That's the gate that will
take us to Nifl... Let's go.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|All right, then... Somebody has to,
so... Off I go!$k$p$EFace_Pain|Huh? Nothing happened.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|The rite I used to come here...$k$pPerhaps too much time has passed,
and its power has dissipated...$k$pDon't worry. I can open the gate once
more. I just need some time.$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It sounds like it might be a while
before Princess Fjorm can complete
the rite to open the way to Nifl...$k$pThe rest of us will need to hold this
position until then.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I'll use the time to prepare a meal
for everyone.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We do need to stay alert, though.
It doesn't seem the enemy is aware
of us, but... That could change.$k$pAs long as we can hold fast until
Princess Fjorm finishes the rite...$k$p$Sbs1000|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Prepare for battle, everyone! Now!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Commander Anna! What's got you so
worked up?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Surtr! He's here!$k$p
